fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector

Interface IPlatformAuthzService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAuthzService, IConnectorService

    public interface IPlatformAuthzService
extends IAuthzService, IConnectorService
    An authorization service that delegates to an OpenAGE server.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IPlatformConnector.getAuthorizationService()
